page.title: 09A Day in my Life
page.content: Two of the children in the class have written about a day they enjoyed. One Saturday morning I got up. It was very sunny we were going to{Ferry} {Meadows.}We were going in the car with my mum and dad and my sister. We took a picnic and a ball to play with. When we got there we got out of the car. My sister ran away and we didn't notice that she had gone. We went to look for her. We were very worried. We looked for her for twenty minutes. Then we found her. She was hiding behind a bush! Then we went to have a picnic. We had sandwiches, biscuits and cakes. After that we went fishing. You can read about another day on page ten and more about leisure on pages twelve and thirteen.
